cards.afterText: Draw 1 card. Move 1 fog token up to 2 spaces, then your opponent moves a different fog token up to 2 spaces.
cards.title: Covert Preparation

cards.afterText: If Invisible Man is on a space with a fog token, all opposing fighters on spaces with fog tokens take 1 damage.
cards.title: Dreaming of Revenge

cards.afterText: Your opponent may choose to discard 1 card. If they do not, you may move each fog token to any other space.
cards.title: Confound

cards.immediateText: The value of your opponent's attack or defense is 0 and cannot be changed by card effects. (Other card effects still happen.)
cards.title: Impossible to See

cards.afterText: If Invisible Man is on a space with a fog token, move that fog token to another space.
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.
cards.title: Surprise Attack

cards.afterText: Move 1 fog token to a space without a fighter, then place Invisible Man on that space.
cards.title: Slip Away

cards.duringText: If Invisible Man started this turn on a space with a fog token, this card's value is 5 instead.
cards.title: Emerge From Mist

cards.afterText:
Draw 1 card and choose 1 effect: 
- move Invisible Man to a space with a fog token
- move 1 fog token up to 3 spaces
cards.title: Lurking

cards.afterText: Move Invisible Man up to 1 space. Your opponent then moves a fog token up to 3 spaces.
cards.title: Into Thin Air

cards.afterText: Draw 3 cards, then choose 2 cards from your hand and put them on top of your deck in any order.
cards.title: Coded Notes

cards.basicText: If Invisible Man is on a space with a fog token, deal 2 damage to any one opposing fighter.
cards.title: Reign of Terror

cards.basicText: Recover 1 health. Remove Invisible Man from the board. At the start of your next turn, place Invisible Man in any space. (If you played this as your first action, end your turn.)
cards.title: Vanish

cards.basicText: Deal 1 damage to one adjacent fighter. If Invisible Man is on a space with a fog token, deal 3 damage instead. Your opponent then moves a fog token up to 2 spaces.
cards.title: Step Lightly

cards.basicText: Move 1 fog token to another space. Gain 1 action.
cards.title: Rolling Fog

cards.afterText:
Choose 2 different effects:
- draw 2 cards
- Alice recovers 3 health
- place Alice in any other space
cards.title: Looking Glass

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 card for them to discard.
cards.title: Snicker-Snack

cards.afterText: Change size.
cards.title: O Frabjous Day!

cards.afterText: Move Alice up to 3 spaces. Change size.
cards.title: The Other Side of the Mushroom

cards.basicText: Move Alice up to 3 spaces. Change size.
cards.title: Eat Me

cards.afterText: Move Alice up to 5 spaces. Change size.
cards.title: I'm Late, I'm Late

cards.basicText: Draw 2 cards. Change size.
cards.title: Drink Me

cards.afterText: Deal 2 damage to any one fighter adjacent to the Jabberwock.
cards.title: Jaws That Bite

cards.duringText: if the opposing fighter is a hero, this card's value is 5 instead.
cards.title: Claws That Catch

cards.duringText: If your fighter started this turn in a different space, this card's value is 5 instead.
cards.title: Momentous Shift

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 2 spaces.
cards.title: Skirmish

cards.afterText: Move each of your fighters up to 2 spaces. Change size.
cards.title: Mad as a Hatter

cards.duringText: Discard the top card of your deck. Add its BOOST value to this card's value.
cards.title: Manxome Foe

cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.
cards.title: Feint

cards.afterText: Draw 1 card. If you won the combat, draw 2 cards instead.
cards.title: Regroup

cards.basicText: Move Bigfoot up to 5 spaces. You may move Bigfoot through spaces containing opposing fighters.
cards.title: Crash Through the Trees

cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.
cards.title: It's Just Your Imagination

cards.duringText: This card's value is +1 for each Sister in the same zone as the opposing fighter.
cards.title: Feeding Frenzy

cards.basicText: Move the Jackalope up to 5 spaces. You may move the Jackalope through spaces containing opposing fighters. Then deal 2 damage to any one fighter adjacent to the Jackalope.
cards.title: Jackalope Horns

cards.afterText: Choose an empty space in this fighter's zone. Place this fighter in that space.
cards.title: Disengage

cards.afterText: Draw 1 card.
cards.title: Exploit

cards.duringText: Your opponent discards 1 random card. Add its BOOST value to this card's attack value.
cards.title: Ambush

cards.duringText: You may discard any number of cards from your hand. This card's value is +1 for each card you discard.
cards.title: Beastform

cards.immediateText: Return your opponent's attack card to their hand. Look at their hand and choose an attack or versatile card for them to play. (It may be the same card.)
cards.title: Do My Bidding

cards.duringText: Add the BOOST value from your opponent's attack card to the defense value of this card.
cards.title: Look Into My Eyes

cards.basicText:
Place Dracula in any space.
Gain 1 action.
cards.title: Mistform

cards.basicText: Deal 1 damage to all opposing fighters adjacent to Dracula. Dracula recovers 1 health for each damage dealt.
cards.title: Prey Upon

cards.basicText: Recover 2 health. Return a defeated Sister (if any) to any space in Dracula's zone.
cards.title: Baptism of Blood

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, place Dracula in any space adjacent to the opposing fighter.
cards.title: Thirst for Sustenance

cards.basicText: Move any fighter up to 2 spaces. After moving, deal 1 damage to the moved fighter for each Sister adjacent to them.
cards.title: Ravening Seduction

cards.afterText: Draw 2 cards.
cards.duringText: If your hand is empty, the value of this card is 6 instead.
cards.title: Little Dragon

cards.afterText: If Bruce Lee has 5 or less health, draw 3 cards.
cards.title: Taste of Blood

cards.afterText: Choose a JEET KUNE DO card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.
cards.title: Be Like Water

cards.afterText: If you lost combat, say "eat me" to your opponent.
cards.basicText: Tee-hee!
cards.duringText: Say "eat me" to your opponent.
cards.immediateText: Say "eat me" to your opponent.
cards.title: Eat Me

cards.afterText: Gain 1 action.
cards.duringText: If either fighter started this turn in a different space, this card's value is 5 instead.
cards.title: Jeet Kune Do: High Straight Lead

cards.afterText: Your opponent discards 1 random card. Gain 1 action.
cards.title: Jeet Kune Do: Downward Side Kick

cards.afterText: Draw 1 card. Gain 1 action.
cards.title: Jeet Kune Do: Wrist Lock

cards.afterText: Gain 1 action.
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.
cards.title: Jeet Kune Do: Intercepting Fist

cards.afterText: Deal 1 damage to the opposing fighter. Gain 1 action.
cards.title: Jeet Kune Do: Corkscrew Finger Jab

cards.afterText: Bruce Lee may swap spaces with the opposing fighter. Gain 1 action.
cards.title: Jeet Kune Do: Short Lead Hook

cards.basicText: Choose an opposing fighter in Bruce Lee's zone. Place them in any space adjacent to Bruce Lee. Gain 1 action.
cards.title: Bring It On

cards.basicText: Deal 2 damage to an adjacent fighter. If this defeats that fighter, return this card to your hand instead of discarding it.
cards.title: One-Inch Punch

cards.basicText: All of Bruce Lee's attacks this turn are +1 value. Gain 1 action.
cards.title: Nunchaku

cards.duringText: If you are Dr. Jekyll and playing this card to defend, this card's value is 6 instead. If you are Mr. Hyde and playing this card to attack, this card's value is 6 instead.
cards.title: Duality of Man

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, recover 2 health.
cards.title: Distracted Triage

cards.afterText: Move up to 2 spaces. Transform to Mr. Hyde.
cards.title: Succumb to Compulsion

cards.afterText: Transform to Dr. Jekyll.
cards.title: Madness Relents

cards.afterText:
Place Mr. Hyde in any space in his zone. 
Transform to Dr. Jekyll.
cards.title: Recoiling Blow

cards.duringText: You may discard Dr. Jekyll cards. Add 2 to this card's value for each card discarded.
cards.title: Forever Hyde

cards.afterText: Move Dr. Jekyll up to 4 spaces.
cards.title: With Haste!

cards.afterText: Draw a number of cards equal to the damage you were dealt.
cards.title: Scientific Method

cards.basicText: Recover 2 health. Draw up to 3 cards. Keep one and put any others on the bottom of your deck in any order.
cards.title: Calming Research

cards.basicText: Reveal the top card of your deck. Deal damage equal to its BOOST value to one adjacent fighter. Put the card in your hand.
cards.title: Strange Case

cards.basicText: Place Mr. Hyde in any space in his zone. Mr. Hyde deals 2 damage to all adjacent fighters.
cards.title: Pure Evil

cards.duringText: You may BOOST this attack. (This is in addition to any boost from King Arthur's special ability.)
cards.title: Noble Sacrifice

cards.afterText: Draw 2 cards.
cards.title: The Aid of Morgana

cards.afterText: Move King Arthur up to 5 spaces.
cards.title: Divine Intervention

cards.afterText: If King Arthur has 4 or less health but is not defeated, set his health to 8.
cards.title: The Holy Grail

cards.basicText: Search your deck and discard pile for the EXCALIBUR card. Add it to your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.
cards.title: The Lady of the Lake

cards.basicText: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 2 of them to your hand and put the other 2 back on top of your deck, in any order.
cards.title: Prophecy

cards.afterText: You may change to your next identity.
cards.title: I'm Not Real

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, deal 8 damage to the opposing fighter.
cards.title: Gaze of Stone

cards.basicText: Deal 2 damage to any one fighter in Medusa's zone.
cards.title: A Momentary Glance

cards.afterText: Your opponent discards 1 card.
cards.title: Hiss and Slither

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, draw 2 cards.
cards.title: Aid the Chosen One

cards.basicText: Choose any space in Merlin's zone. Deal 2 damage to each opposing fighter in that space and in one adjacent space. If at least one fighter is defeated this way, draw 1 card.
cards.title: Restless Spirits

cards.basicText: Move each fighter up to 3 spaces. (This includes opposing fighters.)
cards.title: Command the Storms

cards.afterText: Move your fighter up to 4 spaces.
cards.title: Swift Strike

cards.basicText: Choose a JEET KUNE DO card in your discard pile and add it to your hand. Gain 1 action.
cards.title: "HOO! WHAAAAAA!"

cards.afterText: Move your fighter up to 3 spaces.
cards.title: Dash

cards.afterText: Move your fighter up to 5 spaces. You may move that fighter through spaces containing opposing fighters.
cards.title: Hoax

cards.duringText: You may BOOST this attack.
cards.title: That's Why I Always Win

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, choose a card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.
cards.title: Knowledge of the Craft

cards.basicText: Choose a friendly fighter who has been defeated. Place that fighter in any space in Willow's zone and set their health to 3.
cards.title: Resurrect

cards.afterText: Draw 1 card.
cards.title: Wisdom of Ages

cards.afterText: Move Faith up to 5 spaces. She may move through opposing fighters.
cards.title: Five by Five

cards.basicText: Deal 2 damage to one opposing fighter adjacent to Faith.
cards.title: Killer of the Dead

cards.afterText: If you lost the combat, recover 1 health.
cards.title: Cursed with a Soul

cards.afterText: If you lost the combat, you may place Angel in any space in his zone.
cards.title: Haunted by the Faces

cards.afterText: If you lost the combat, the opposing fighter takes 1 damage.
cards.title: Brooding

cards.basicText: Choose an opponent and look at their hand. Choose 1 card in their hand for them to discard.
cards.title: Insight

cards.duringText: If Spike or the opposing fighter is in a space with a shadow token, the value of this card is 5 instead.
cards.title: The Rush

cards.basicText: Choose an opponent and look at their hand. Choose a card for them to discard. If any of their fighters are in a space with a shadow token, choose 2 cards for them to discard instead.
cards.title: The Sight

cards.duringText: If Spike or the opposing fighter is in a space with a shadow token,  you may BOOST this card.
cards.title: Let's Dance

cards.basicText: Draw 3 cards.
cards.title: Training

cards.immediateText: Cancel any abilities on your opponent's card.
cards.notes: Even though the card text says _abilities_, the intention is for this card to cancel _effects_; this card was created before the wording was standardized.
cards.title: Revoke

cards.afterText: Buffy recovers 1 health.
cards.title: Rapid Recovery

cards.duringText: (DARK) BLIND BOOST this attack.
cards.title: Flayed Alive

cards.basicText:
Draw 2 cards.
(DARK) Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. Deal 3 damage to a sidekick in your zone (even if it's your own).
cards.title: Love and Loss

cards.duringText: (DARK) BLIND BOOST this card.
cards.title: Black Magic

cards.afterText: (DARK) Become Willow.
cards.title: Meditation

cards.afterText: Move each Harpy up to 3 spaces.
cards.title: The Hounds of Mighty Zeus

cards.afterText: Your opponent discards 1 card.
cards.title: Clutching Claws

cards.basicText: Move each of your fighters up to 3 spaces. You may move them through spaces containing opposing fighters. Then, return a defeated Harpy (if any) to any space in Medusa's zone.
cards.title: Winged Frenzy

cards.basicText: Choose one of your Raptors. You may place each of your other Raptors in any space in the chosen Raptor's zone.
cards.title: Coordinated Attack Pattern

cards.afterText: Draw 1 card.
cards.title: Snipe

cards.basicText: Move each of your Raptors up to 3 spaces. You may move them through spaces containing opposing fighters. Gain 1 action.
cards.title: Working Things Out

cards.afterText: Gain 1 action.
cards.title: They Remember

cards.basicText: Draw 1 card, then choose an opponent. They may choose to discard 1 card. If they do not, draw 1 more card.
cards.title: Steal From the Rich

cards.afterText: Draw a number of cards equal to the amount of damage dealt to the opposing fighter.
cards.title: Disarming Shot

cards.afterText: Draw 2 cards.
cards.title: Piercing Shot

cards.afterText: Draw 1 card. Return a defeated Outlaw (if any) to any space in Robin Hood's zone.
cards.title: Defenders of Sherwood

cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card and ignore its defense value.
cards.title: Highway Robbery

cards.afterText: If your fighter is adjacent to the opposing fighter, draw 1 card.
cards.title: Snark

cards.afterText: Deal 1 damage to each opposing fighter adjacent to your fighter.
cards.title: Wily Fighting

cards.afterText: If one or more of your Raptors is adjacent to the opposing fighter, gain 1 action.
cards.title: Clever Girl

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, deal 1 damage to the opposing fighter for each of your Raptors adjacent to them.
cards.title: Pack Hunters

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, deal 1 damage to one adjacent opposing fighter.
cards.title: Eaten Alive

cards.immediateText: Choose one of your other undefeated Raptors. You may place her adjacent to the opposing fighter.
cards.title: Decoy

cards.duringText: if Xander is adjacent to Buffy, the value of this card is 6 instead.
cards.title: Right-hand Man

cards.afterText: Draw 1 card.
cards.title: Military Knowledge

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, draw 2 cards. Otherwise, take 1 damage.
cards.title: Daring Strike

cards.afterText: You may move all fighters adjacent to Buffy to another space in their zone. Then, deal 1 damage to each fighter you moved.
cards.title: Slayer's Strength

cards.basicText:
Draw 2 cards.
Place a shadow token in Spike's space and each space adjacent to it.
cards.title: Seek the Shadows

cards.afterText: Draw 1 card. If the opposing fighter is in a space with a shadow token, draw 3 cards instead.
cards.title: Empathy

cards.duringText: BLIND BOOST this card. If Drusilla's space has a shadow token, double the BOOST value.
cards.title: Always Surprising

cards.duringText: You may discard your hand (even if your hand is empty). If you do, the value of this card is 6 instead.
cards.title: Arrogance

cards.afterText: Deal 1 damage to the opposing fighter, then deal an additional 1 damage for each space with a shadow token adjacent to them.
cards.title: Bloody Hell!

cards.afterText: (DARK) Move Willow to any space in her zone. Discard the top card of your deck.
cards.title: When Good Magic Fails

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, your opponent draws 1 card. If you lost the combat, you draw 2 cards.
cards.title: Education Never Ends

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, look at your opponent's hand.
cards.title: Study Methods

cards.duringText: You may change the printed value of the opponent's card to its BOOST value. (If a card does not have a BOOST value, it is treated as 0.)
cards.title: Deduce Strategy

cards.afterText: If Holmes is adjacent to the opposing fighter, deal 2 damage to that fighter.
cards.title: Counterpunch

cards.afterText: If Dr. Watson is adjacent to Holmes, they each recover 1 health.
cards.title: Fixed Point in a Changing Age

cards.afterText: Move Holmes up to 3 spaces.
cards.title: The Game is Afoot

cards.basicText: Play this card face up. Predict the printed attack value of the opponent's card.
cards.duringText: If you predicted the correct value, cancel all effects on your opponent's card and ignore its attack value.
cards.title: Elementary

cards.basicText: Choose an opponent and name a value. Your opponent must choose and discard one card matching that attack or defense value. Their hero takes damage equal to the BOOST value of the discarded card. If they do not have a card of the named value, they must reveal their hand instead.
cards.title: Confirm Suspicion

cards.basicText: Choose an opponent. Look at their hand and choose 1 card for them to discard.
cards.title: Eliminate the Impossible

cards.basicText: Choose an opponent. Holmes swaps spaces with their hero. Deal 1 damage to that hero.
cards.title: Master of Disguise

cards.basicText: Place Dr. Watson in a space adjacent to Holmes. Holmes recovers 1 health. Draw 1 card.
cards.title: Administer Aid

cards.afterText: Move Sinbad up to 3 spaces.
cards.title: Toil and Danger

cards.afterText: Take all other VOYAGE cards from your discard pile and add them to your hand.
cards.duringText: This card's value is +1 for each other VOYAGE card in your discard pile.
cards.title: Voyage Home

cards.basicText: Draw 3 cards.
cards.title: Riches Beyond Compare

cards.afterText: Draw 2 cards.
cards.title: By Fortune and Fate

cards.afterText: Sinbad recovers 2 health.
cards.duringText: This card's value is +1 for each other VOYAGE card in your discard pile.
cards.title: Voyage to the Island That Was a Whale

cards.afterText: Look at your opponent's hand.
cards.duringText: This card's value is +1 for each other VOYAGE card in your discard pile.
cards.title: Voyage to the Valley of the Giant Snakes

cards.afterText: Your opponent discards 1 random card.
cards.duringText: This card's value is +1 for each other VOYAGE card in your discard pile.
cards.title: Voyage to the Creature With Eyes Like Coals of Fire

cards.afterText: You may move Sinbad up to 2 spaces.
cards.duringText: This card's value is +1 for each other VOYAGE card in your discard pile.
cards.title: Voyage to the Cannibals With the Root of Madness

cards.afterText: Deal 2 damage to the opposing fighter.
cards.duringText: This card's value is +1 for each other VOYAGE card in your discard pile.
cards.title: Voyage to the City of the Man-Eating Apes

cards.afterText: Draw 1 card.
cards.duringText: This card's value is +1 for each other VOYAGE card in your discard pile.
cards.title: Voyage to the City of the King of Serendib

cards.afterText: Draw 1 card.
cards.title: Commanding Impact

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 4 spaces.
cards.title: Leap Away

cards.duringText: You may BOOST this attack.
cards.title: Second Shot

cards.basicText:
Choose 2 different effects:
- place up to 3 traps
- place all of your defeated InGen Workers (if any) in Muldoon's zone
- draw 2 cards
cards.title: Call for Backup

cards.duringText: You may BOOST this attack.
cards.title: Second Shot

cards.afterText: Move the opposing fighter up to 3 spaces.
cards.title: Rending Shot

cards.duringText: If this is your first action this turn, this card's value is 5 instead.
cards.title: Shoot Her!

cards.afterText: Move each of your InGen Workers up to 2 spaces.
cards.title: Tactical Advance

cards.afterText: Move each of your fighters up to 5 spaces. You may move them through spaces containing opposing fighters.
cards.title: I've Hunted Most Things That Can Hunt You

cards.duringText: +1 to this attack for each trap token adjacent to the opposing fighter.
cards.title: They Should All Be Destroyed

cards.basicText: Choose a trap in the same zone as one of your Ingen Workers. Deal 1 damage to each opposing fighter adjacent to that trap. Return that trap.
cards.title: Remote Detonation

cards.afterText: Deal 1 damage to each opposing fighter adjacent to Faith.
cards.title: The Rogue Slayer

cards.afterText: You may move Buffy up to 3 spaces. Then, deal 1 damage to each opposing fighter adjacent to her.
cards.title: Cartwheel Kick

cards.duringText: If there is food on the table, the value of this card is 5 instead.
cards.title: Chimichanga Break!

cards.basicText: Move each of your fighters up to 2 spaces. Each of your fighters recovers 1 health. Draw 1 card.
cards.title: One With The Land

cards.afterText: Draw a card. Recover 1 health.
cards.title: Gimme Gimme Chimichanga

cards.basicText: Shuffle 5 cards from your discard pile into your deck. Recover 1 health.
cards.title: Dumpster Divin' Deadpool

cards.afterText: Look at your opponent's hand. Recover 1 health.
cards.title: Non-Retinal Scan Access to Danger Room

cards.immediateText: Call time out. Look through your deck and pick a card you could play. Discard this card and play that one instead.
cards.title: Time out time out time out!

cards.basicText: This card's effects cannot be canceled.
cards.duringText: You may spend 2 Rage to make this card's value 5 instead. You may spend 1 Rage to BOOST this card. (You may do both.)
cards.title: The Ancient Heirloom

cards.afterText:
You may return this card to your hand.
🌹 Instead, you may return the top card of your discard pile to your hand.
cards.title: What Large Hands You Have 🐺

cards.afterText: Look at the top card of your deck, then choose to put it on the top of your deck or the bottom of your deck.
cards.title: Hacker

cards.afterText: Your opponent discards a card. If you won the combat, they discard two instead.
cards.title: Excuse me while I grow some limbs.

cards.afterText: Draw 1 card.
cards.basicText: This card can't be canceled!
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.
cards.title: Super Feint

cards.basicText: Guess the name of a card in your opponent's hand. Your opponent must discard all cards with that name. Otherwise they say "go fish" and you draw a card.
cards.title: Holy Mackerel!

cards.basicText: Tip your figure over. Make a fainting noise. Recover 2 health. Reset your figure.
cards.title: Faint

cards.afterText: Wiglaf may swap spaces with Beowulf.
cards.title: Hot for the Battle

cards.afterText: If you're not wearing any pants, go put some on.
cards.duringText: If this card isn't sleeved, its value is 5.
cards.title: I'm Not Wearing Pants

cards.basicText: Move to a space in a yellow-ish zone. Then move to a different space in a yellow-ish zone.
cards.title: Sweeet!

cards.afterText: If you won the game your opponent buys you a drink. If you lost the game, you buy them a drink.
cards.title: Wanna bet?

cards.afterText: Your opponent writes their name on this card if it's not there already.
cards.duringText: If your opponent's name is on this card, its value is 4.
cards.title: Call Me

cards.afterText: If the opposing fighter is adjacent to Yennenga, deal them 2 damage.
cards.title: Point Blank

cards.immediateText: You may return a defeated Archer to a space in the opposing fighter's zone. If you do, that Archer is now the attacker. If not, gain 1 action.
cards.title: Surprise Volley

cards.afterText: Deal 2 damage to the opposing fighter OR move your fighter up to 3 spaces.
cards.title: And For My Next Move...

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, draw 1 card.
cards.title: We're All In This Together

cards.afterText: 🐺  Deal damage to the opposing fighter equal to the printed value of their card.
cards.title: What a Terrible Big Mouth You Have ⚔️

cards.basicText: ⚔️ You may play this card as a defense card.
cards.title: What Big Ears You Have 🐺

cards.immediateText:
Cancel all effects on your opponent's card. 
🌹 Also ignore the value of your opponent's card.
cards.title: What Big Eyes You Have 🐺

cards.basicText:
🐺  Place Little Red in any space. Gain 1 action. 
⚔️ Deal 2 damage to each opposing fighter in Little Red's zone. 
🌹 Draw 3 cards.
cards.title: Never Leave the Path 🐺

cards.afterText: 🐺 Draw 2 cards.
cards.title: The Wolf's Skin ⚔️

cards.duringText: If the Huntsman is adjacent to the opposing fighter, the value of this card is 6 instead.
cards.title: Long Have I Sought You ⚔️

cards.basicText:
Little Red Recovers 2 health.
🐺 Little Red recovers 4 health instead.
cards.title: A Grimm Tale 🌹

cards.duringText: ⚔️ Your opponent discards 1 random card. Add its BOOST value to this card's value.
cards.title: Stones in the Belly 🌹

cards.afterText: ⚔️ Deal 3 damage to the opposing fighter.
cards.title: Once Upon a Time 🌹

cards.basicText: Move Little Red up to 3 spaces. Gain 1 action.
cards.notes: Each copy of INTO THE WOODS has one of the three symbols on it.
cards.title: Into the Woods 🐺🌹⚔️

cards.duringText: This card's value is +1 for each Rage you have. (You do not spend Rage for this effect.)
cards.immediateText: Gain 1 Rage.
cards.title: Epic Poem

cards.afterText: If you attacked a sidekick and won the combat, you may spend 3 Rage to defeat that sidekick.
cards.title: No Contest Expecteth

cards.duringText: Spend any amount of Rage. This card's value is +2 for each Rage spent.
cards.title: The War-King

cards.immediateText: You may spend 2 Rage to deal damage to the opposing fighter equal to the printed value of their card.
cards.title: The Equal of Grendel

cards.basicText: Choose an opponent. They discard 1 random card. Gain rage equal to its BOOST value.
cards.title: Vigor and Courage

cards.basicText: Spend any amount of Rage. Choose a different effect for each Rage spent: - draw 2 cards - move Beowulf up to 4 spaces - Beowulf recovers 2 health.
cards.title: Golden Drinking Horn

cards.basicText: Wiglaf deals 1 damage to each adjacent fighter. If Beowulf was dealt damage this way, gain 1 action.
cards.title: Remnant of Valor

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, draw 2 cards. If you lost the combat, your opponent draws 2 cards.
cards.title: Fatal Struggle

cards.basicText: (🌟 counts as any one 🐺🌹⚔️ symbol.)
cards.title: What's That In My Basket? 🌟

cards.afterText: Move to any space in your zone.
cards.title: Transit Card

cards.afterText: Recover 2 health. Then, if you are at full health, take 2 damage.
cards.title: They Have An Amazing Buffet

cards.basicText: You may play this card as a ranged attack.
cards.title: Xavier Institute Faculty

cards.afterText: Your opponent looks at your hand and chooses a card for you to discard.
cards.title: Passwords

cards.immediateText: Your opponent may discard a card. If they don't, return a defeated Archer to a space in Yennenga's zone.
cards.title: Shield Formation

cards.afterText: Move the opposing fighter one space. Just one.
cards.title: Rob's Pouch & Shoe Emporium

cards.afterText: You may draw 2 cards. If you do, take 2 damage.
cards.title: Good Enough For Us

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, you may look at the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck and discard one of them. Place the other 2 back in any order.
cards.title: That's The Part I Like

cards.duringText: For each zone the opposing fighter is in, increase the value of this card by +1.
cards.title: Jaws of the Beast

cards.afterText: Move Yennenga up to 5 spaces. She may move through opposing fighters. Then, deal 1 damage to each opposing fighter she moved through.
cards.title: Stallion Charge

cards.basicText: Gain 2 actions.
cards.title: Master of the Hunt

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, move the opposing fighter up to 4 spaces.
cards.title: Fist of Khonshu

cards.afterText: Discard the top card of your deck. Draw cards equal to that card's BOOST value.
cards.title: Let Your Insanity Guide You

cards.duringText: Add the BOOST value of the top card of your discard pile to this card's value.
cards.title: Past and Present Intermingle

cards.afterText: You may deal 2 damage to both fighters in the combat.
cards.title: A Totally Sane Thing To Do

cards.afterText: You may spend 1 Hellfire to draw 2 cards.
cards.title: Spirit Of Vengeance

cards.afterText: You may spend 2 Hellfire to gain 1 action.
cards.title: I Brought The Devil With Me

cards.afterText: Spend any amount of Hellfire, Deal that much damage to each fighter in Ghost Rider's zone (including Ghost Rider).
cards.title: Blaze of Glory

cards.afterText: If you lost the combat, gain Hellfire equal to the combat damage you took.
cards.title: Stoke The Flames

cards.duringText: You may spend any amount of Hellfire. Increase the value of this card by that amount.
cards.title: Deal With The Devil

cards.afterText: You may spend 1 Hellfire to move Ghost Rider up to 2 spaces.
cards.title: I Finally Escaped Hell

cards.duringText: This card's value is +1 for each Hellfire you have. (You do not spend Hellfire for this effect.)
cards.title: Control The Demon

cards.duringText: Add the BOOST value of the opposing fighter's card to this card's value. You may spend 2 Hellfire to do it a second time.
cards.title: Penance Stare

cards.afterText: If Ghost Rider started this turn in a different space, gain 2 Hellfire.
cards.title: The Wicked Will Burn

cards.basicText: Set your Hellfire to 5.
cards.title: Chains of Hellfire

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, draw 2 cards.
cards.title: Get Paid

cards.duringText: You may BOOST this attack.
cards.title: Hero For Hire

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, choose 2 cards in your discard pile and shuffle them into your deck.
cards.title: Still Standing

cards.afterText: If you lost the combat, deal damage to the opposing fighter equal to the amount of combat damage you took.
cards.title: Skin Like Titanium

cards.afterText: Move the opposing fighter up to 3 spaces. You may move them through other opposing fighters. Deal 1 damage to them and each opposing fighter they moved through.
cards.title: Power Man

cards.immediateText: Misty Knight may swap spaces with Luke Cage. If she does, Luke Cage is now the defender.
cards.title: Got My Back?

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, end the turn.
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.
cards.title: Trash Talk

cards.afterText: Move the opposing fighter up to 3 spaces.
cards.title: Pushback

cards.duringText: If Misty Knight is adjacent to the opposing fighter, the value of this card is 6 instead.
cards.title: Daughter of the Dragon

cards.basicText:
Move your fighter up to 4 spaces. They may move through opposing fighters.
Gain 1 action.
cards.title: Travelers of The Night

cards.basicText:
Place Luke Cage adjacent to the nearest opposing fighter.
Gain 1 action.
cards.title: Where's My Money?

cards.basicText:
Move Ghost Rider and up to one adjacent fighter up to 4 spaces each.
Gain 2 Hellfire. Gain 1 action.
cards.title: Hell Rides With Me

cards.afterText: Move Daredevil up to 2 spaces.
cards.title: Grappling Hook

cards.basicText: Choose an attack, defense, or versatile card from your discard pile and return it to your hand.
cards.title: Breather

cards.basicText: Move Daredevil up to 4 spaces. He may move through opposing fighters. Deal 1 damage to each opposing fighter Daredevil moves through.
cards.title: Through Adversity

cards.immediateText: If you already won a combat this turn, ignore the value of your opponent's card.
cards.title: World's Greatest Assassin

cards.duringText: If you started your turn in your current space, the value of this card is 5 instead.
cards.title: I Planned To Be Here

cards.duringText: You may BOOST this attack. If you don't BOOST this attack, draw 1 card.
cards.title: I Never Miss

cards.afterText: Move Bullseye up to 1 space. Draw 1 card. Gain 1 action.
cards.title: For My Next Trick

cards.basicText:
Recover 2 health.
If you started your turn in a different space, gain 1 action.
cards.title: Madness Will Keep You Alive

cards.afterText: Draw 1 card.
cards.title: Push to Teleport

cards.duringText: You may BOOST this card.
cards.title: Cha-Ching!

cards.afterText: If you attacked, deal 1 damage to the opposing fighter.
cards.title: I Always Get The Last Word

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, deal 3 damage to each other opposing fighter adjacent to the opposing fighter.
cards.title: Klunkin' Heads

cards.basicText: Sun Wukong recovers 1 health for each Clone on the board.
cards.title: Phoenix Form

cards.afterText: If you lost the combat, your opponent gains 1 action.
cards.title: Achilles' Heel

cards.afterText: If this is your third action, draw 1 card.
cards.duringText: Your opponent discards 1 random card. Add its BOOST value to this card's value.
cards.title: Out Of The Mirror

cards.duringText: If your fighter is not in Yennenga's zone, the value of this card is a 4 instead.
cards.title: Divide and Conquer

cards.afterText:
If your opponent played a defense card, TRICKED YOU.
TRICKED YOU: 4 ATK
cards.title: Ruyi Jingo Bang

cards.afterText: Gain 1 action.
cards.duringText: For each other friendly fighter adjacent to the opposing fighter, increase the value of this card by +1.
cards.title: Infinite Strikes

cards.afterText: If the value of this card matches your opponent's card, draw 1 card and the opposing fighter takes 2 damage.
cards.duringText: You may increase or decrease the value of this card by 1.
cards.title: Broken Glass

cards.duringText: If you made an exploding noise when you revealed the card the value of this card is 4.
cards.title: Exploding Card!

cards.afterText: Draw 1 card.
cards.title: 3 of Hearts

cards.afterText: Deal 1 damage to the opposing fighter if you own the Deadpool Unmatched set.
cards.title: Deadpool™ Merc For Hire, LLC

cards.afterText: If this is your third action this turn, recover 3 health.
cards.duringText: You may BOOST this attack.
cards.title: Ghostly Touch

cards.duringText: If this is your third action this turn, this card's value is 7 instead.
cards.title: Speak Three Times

cards.afterText:
BLOODY REPRISE: 0 ATK
DURING COMBAT: If your opponent played a card against BLOODY REQUIEM, this attack's value is that card's printed value.
cards.title: Bloody Requiem

cards.afterText: You may place Bloody Mary in any empty space adjacent to the opposing fighter.
cards.title: Trick of the Light

cards.duringText: If Bloody Mary shares no zones with the space she started in this turn, this card's value is 6 instead.
cards.title: Jump Scare

cards.afterText: Choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 4 spaces.
cards.title: Infinity Mirror

cards.duringText: The value of this card is equal to the printed value of your opponent's card.
cards.title: Mirror Image

cards.afterText: Draw 1 card.
cards.title: Evade

cards.basicText: Look at an opponent's hand and choose a card. Your opponent may discard it. If they don't, their hero takes damage equal to its BOOST value.
cards.title: Stolen Memories

cards.duringText: You may deal 2 damage to Patroclus. If you do, the value of this attack is 5 instead.
cards.title: The Day of Your Doom

cards.afterText: Shuffle this card and the top four cards of your discard pile into your deck.
cards.duringText: If you have no cards in your deck, the value of this card is 8 instead.
cards.title: Devil of Hell's Kitchen

cards.afterText: RELENTLESS ASSAULT: 3 ATK
cards.title: Test For Weakness

cards.afterText: If Patroclus is not defeated, gain 1 action.
cards.title: Brothers In Arms

cards.afterText: Choose a card in your discard pile and return it to your hand.
cards.title: Battle Hardened

cards.afterText: Move each of your fighters up to 3 spaces. They may move through opposing fighters.
cards.title: Blessed By Hermes

cards.immediateText: If Patroclus is not defeated, Achilles may swap spaces with him. If he does, Patroclus is now the defender.
cards.title: Under Achilles' Helm

cards.basicText: Deal 2 damage to an opposing fighter in Achilles' zone.
cards.title: Spear Throw

cards.duringText: You may BLIND BOOST this attack. (This is in addition to any BLIND BOOST from Daredevil's special ability.)
cards.title: Man Without Fear

cards.afterText: If you lost the combat, deal 2 damage to a fighter adjacent to Daredevil.
cards.title: Son Of A Boxer

cards.immediateText: Your opponent may discard 1 card from their hand. If they don't, ignore their card's value.
cards.title: Taunting Laughter

cards.basicText: This card's effects cannot be canceled.
cards.duringText: If your opponent played a card, they may BOOST it.
cards.title: Ox Form

cards.afterText: Take an OX FORM, TORTOISE FORM, or PHOENIX FORM from your discard pile and return it to your hand.
cards.title: 72 Transformations

cards.afterText: If Sun Wukong played this card, summon a Clone in Sun Wukong's space, then place Sun Wukong in a space in his zone.
cards.title: Sly Monkey

cards.duringText: Any combat damage you would take is dealt to the opposing fighter instead.
cards.title: Golden Chain Mail

cards.duringText: Your opponent may BOOST their attack.
cards.title: Tortoise Form

cards.basicText: Look at an opponent's hand and choose a card. Put that card on the bottom of their deck. You each draw 1 card.
cards.title: Fiery Eyes That See

cards.afterText: Discard the top card of your deck. Recover health equal to its BOOST value.
cards.title: Take A Knee

cards.afterText: VOLLEY: 3 ATK
cards.title: Rain of Arrows

cards.afterText: Move the opposing fighter up to 4 spaces. Your opponent discards 1 card.
cards.title: Pin the Prey

cards.afterText: Place Bullseye in a space that shares no zones with his current space.
cards.title: Tactical Retreat

cards.afterText: Move Bullseye exactly 4 spaces. You may move through opposing fighters.
cards.title: Master Strategist

cards.afterText: You are considered to have won this combat. Move Bullseye up to 2 spaces.
cards.title: Arrogant But Effective

cards.immediateText: If you already won a combat this turn, your opponent discards 1 card.
cards.title: Right Between The Eyes

cards.afterText: If the opposing fighter was not defeated, deal 1 damage to a fighter in the opposing fighter's zone.
cards.title: Ricochet

cards.duringText: If you already won a combat this turn, the value of this card is 6 instead.
cards.title: I'm Better And I'll Prove It

cards.basicText: Draw 2 cards.If you won a combat this turn, draw 1 additional card and gain 1 action.
cards.title: Study The Target

cards.afterText: Elektra takes 3 damage.RESURRECTED: Elektra takes no damage instead.
cards.title: Mystic Assassin

cards.afterText: You may deal 1 damage to your attacking fighter. If you do, return this card to your hand and gain 1 action.
cards.title: The Fist

cards.afterText: Return a defeated Hand to a space in Elektra's zone.
cards.title: Hands of Red

cards.duringText: RESURRECTED: You may reveal a card named SAI from your hand. If you do, the value of this card is 5 instead.
cards.title: Intercept

cards.immediateText: Elektra may swap spaces with a Hand. If she does, that Hand is now the defender.
cards.title: Snakeroot Clan

cards.afterText: Place your fighter in any space.
cards.title: Ninjitsu

cards.afterText: RESURRECTED: Deal 1 damage to each adjacent opposing fighter.
cards.title: Whirlwind

cards.basicText: Choose an opponent and look at their hand. Gain 1 action.RESURRECTED: Choose 1 card for them to discard.
cards.title: Mesmerize

cards.afterText: Deal 2 damage to both fighters in the combat.
cards.title: Battle Frenzy

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, deal 1 damage to each fighter adjacent to Bigfoot.
cards.title: Savagery

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, return this card to your hand.
cards.duringText: You may BOOST this card.
cards.title: You're Just Making Her Angry

cards.afterText: Take 2 damage.
cards.duringText: Ignore the value of your opponent's card.
cards.title: 15,000 Pounds of Muscle

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, deal 1 damage to each opposing fighter in T-Rex's zone.
cards.duringText: You may BOOST this card.
cards.title: Thrash

cards.afterText: Deal 3 damage to the opposing fighter. Then, take 3 damage.
cards.title: Reckless Lunge

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, draw 1 card, gain 1 action, and take 2 damage.
cards.duringText: You may BOOST this card.
cards.title: When Dinosaurs Ruled the Earth

cards.basicText: Choose a card in your discard pile other than "65 Million Years of Gut Instinct" and return it to your hand.
cards.title: 65 Million Years of Gut Instinct

cards.immediateText: Fighters cannot leave their spaces for the rest of the turn.
cards.title: Terrifying Roar

cards.basicText: Place T-Rex in any space in her zone. Then, each opponent with a fighter adjacent to T-Rex discards 1 random card.
cards.title: Ripples in the Water

cards.immediateText: Draw 1 card. Dr Sattler recovers health equal to the number of insight tokens on the board. Remove all insight tokens from the board.
cards.title: Woman Inherits the Earth

cards.afterText: Deal 2 damage to each opposing fighter on or adjacent to a space with an insight token.
cards.title: Violently, If Necessary

cards.duringText: Increase the value of this card by the number of insight tokens on the board. Remove all insight tokens from the board.
cards.title: You Never Had Control, That's the Illusion

cards.afterText: You may move Dr. Sattler 1 space.
cards.duringText: If the opposing fighter is a hero, the value of this card is 4 instead.
cards.title: Sexism in Survival Situations

cards.duringText: The value of this card is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
cards.title: I Think We're Back In Business

cards.afterText: Place an insight token in any space.
cards.title: Chaotician

cards.afterText: Your opponent discards the top card of their deck. Dr. Malcolm and Dr. Sattler recover health equal to that card's BOOST value.
cards.title: Life Finds a Way

cards.basicText: Draw 2 cards. Place an insight token in Dr. Malcolm's space. Gain 1 action.
cards.title: The Future Ex-Mrs. Malcolm

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, you may place Dr. Malcolm and Dr. Sattler in any space.
cards.title: Must Go Faster

cards.afterText: Deal 2 damage to the opposing fighter. Move your fighter up to 2 spaces.
cards.title: Lock The Doors!

cards.afterText: Move your other fighter up to 4 spaces.
cards.title: Hey! Hey! Hey!

cards.afterText: You may place your fighter on any space with an insight token.
cards.title: The Concept of Attraction

cards.basicText: Move your fighter up to 1 space. Draw 1 card. Gain 1 action.
cards.notes: Versions of this card feature the fighter's name instead of "your fighter" in the text.
cards.title: Closer Than She Appears

cards.afterText: You may place your fighter in any space.
cards.duringText: Prevent all damage
cards.notes: The Merlin version of this card says "Merlin" instead of "your fighter".
cards.title: Bewilderment

cards.afterText: RESURRECTED: Move Elektra up to 3 spaces.
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.
cards.title: Cloaked In Shadow

cards.duringText: You may BOOST this card.
cards.immediateText: Your opponent may BOOST their card.
cards.title: An Illusion of My Own Design

cards.basicText: BOOSTED WITH: Draw 1 card.
cards.duringText: You may BOOST this card.
cards.title: Flourish

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, place your fighter in any space.
cards.duringText: You may BOOST this card.
cards.title: Grand Escape

cards.basicText: BOOSTED WITH: Deal 2 damage to any fighter.
cards.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.
cards.title: Misdirection

cards.basicText: BOOSTED WITH: Draw 1 card.
cards.immediateText: You may return this card to your hand and choose a different card to play. Resolve all effects on that card as normal.
cards.title: Sleight of Hand

cards.immediateText: Houdini and Bess may swap spaces. If they do, your other fighter is now in the combat.
cards.title: Smoke and Mirrors

cards.afterText: Return one card you boosted with to your hand.
cards.duringText: You may BOOST this card twice.
cards.title: The Big Reveal

cards.afterText: Choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 3 spaces. They may move through their opposing fighters.
cards.title: Vanishing Act

cards.afterText: If you lost the combat, deal 1 damage to an adjacent opposing fighter.
cards.title: Careful What You Wish For

cards.immediateText: The Genie recovers 4 health.
cards.title: Back In The Lamp

cards.afterText: Place the Genie in any empty space. Then, deal 1 damage to each adjacent fighter.
cards.title: I Am Freed

cards.afterText: You may deal 1 damage to an adjacent fighter.
cards.title: I Grant You Death

cards.afterText: You may discard 2 cards to deal 2 damage to an adjacent opposing fighter.
cards.title: Imprisoned Wrath

cards.afterText: Look at your opponent's hand and choose a card for them to discard.
cards.title: I've Made Sultans Out of Less

cards.afterText: Draw cards equal to the amount of combat damage you took.
cards.title: Prisoner's Torment

cards.duringText: The value of your opponent's card is equal to its BOOST value.
cards.title: This is No Parlor Trick

cards.afterText: Your opponent draws 1 card. Draw 3 cards.
cards.title: Wishing For More Wishes

cards.afterText: If you won the combat, you may discard 2 cards to gain 1 action.
cards.title: Your Wish is My Command

cards.basicText:
Gain 1 action and choose one effect:
- draw 5 cards
- for the rest of your turn, your cards' values are 4 and cannot be changed
- each opponent discards 2 cards
cards.title: Three Wishes

cards.basicText:
Draw 2 cards. Gain 1 action.
If an effect would let an opponent look at your hand, you may reveal this card and cancel that effect.
cards.title: A Magician Never Reveals His Secrets

cards.basicText:
BOOSTED WITH: If it's your turn, gain 1 action.
If you discard this card as a result of an opponent's effect, draw 1 card.
cards.title: And the Beautiful Bess!

cards.afterText: If your fighter was defeated, set their health to 4 instead and place them in any space. (This effect happens even if Houdini was defeated.)
cards.basicText:
BOOSTED WITH: Houdini recovers 2 health.
This card's effect cannot be canceled.
cards.title: All Part of the Show

cards.basicText:
BOOSTED WITH: Look at an opponent's hand and choose a card for them to discard.
Draw 3 cards. Then, put a card in your hand on top of your deck.
cards.title: Set the Stage
